recipe_name: Roasted Pork Shoulder with Pomegranate Sauce
ingredients: 1 (3 pound) bone-in pork shoulder roast, 2 teaspoons minced garlic,   kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste, 2  pomegranates with the seeds removed,   +   1/2 cup water, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 2 tablespoons turbinado sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
nutrition: Total Fat 26g 33%, Saturated Fat 9g 47%, Cholesterol 136mg 45%, Sodium 200mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 20g, Protein 42g, Vitamin C 6mg 28%, Calcium 52mg 4%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 761mg 16%
